thread.title: Candy Crush 'guru' wins Google Ventures' first investment in mainland Europe
thread.title_full: Candy Crush 'guru' wins Google Ventures' first investment in mainland Europe

author: Lauren Davidson
title: Candy Crush 'guru' wins Google Ventures' first investment in mainland Europe
text: Media and Telecoms Candy Crush 'guru' wins Google Ventures' first investment in mainland Europe Resolution Games, which was started by the former "games guru" of Candy Crush maker King, has secured the largest investment round into a virtual reality gamer The maker of virtual reality game Solitaire Jester has raised $6m
